isRightSection.title: Is a Pompadour Right for You?

tableData.description: Medium – needs styling products & regular trims

textContent: Wondering if a pompadour fits your face or hair? Let's break it down simply.

If you have an oval or heart-shaped face, a pompadour will look great—it adds height and balances proportions. Square or long faces? Go for a softer pompadour or shorter volume to avoid exaggerating sharp lines or height.
Thick or coarse hair holds the style really well. Fine or thin hair? A smaller pompadour with matte wax can work wonders. Got curly hair? Great! Pompadours with curls are super trendy now.

additionalSection.title: Explore the Pompadour Fade – From Classic to Bold
textContent: The pompadour fade comes in many styles. Love clean and sharp? Try a high fade pompadour. Want something more relaxed? Go with a low or mid fade. There's a style for every vibe—from classic Elvis to modern Beckham or K-pop bold. You can even mix it with curly or messy tops.
Not sure about fade lengths? Here's a quick guide:
#1: Super short, skin-close. #2: Slightly visible but tight.
#3-4: Balanced look, not too short. #5-6: Softer fade, best for beginners.
And the best part? You don't need to guess. Try all versions with Hairstyle AI. Upload your photo, pick your fade, and preview it before going to the barbershop.

image.alt: pompadour haircut styles and variations guide - cool man with pompadour

howToUseSection.title: How to Try a Pompadour Hairstyle with AI in 1 Minute
howToUseSection.description: No haircut, no guesswork. Just follow these easy steps and see yourself in a brand-new style.

steps.title: Step 1: Upload Your Photo
steps.description: Choose a clear front-facing photo. Make sure your face is fully visible, with good lighting and no heavy shadows. We support JPG, PNG, and JPEG formats. Max file size is 3MB. Don't worry—your image is not saved.

steps.title: Step 2: Pick Your Pompadour Style and More men's Hairstyle
steps.description: Scroll through 60+ hairstyles and 19 hair colors. Want a short pompadour? A curly one? Or a bold fade? Tap to preview any style that catches your eye. You can try five times a day—for free!

steps.title: Step 3: Let AI Do the Work
steps.description: Click "Generate." Our smart AI will analyze your face shape, hairline, and texture. In about 30 seconds, you'll see a realistic image of you with the new hairstyle. No weird filters or distorted faces—just you, styled.

steps.title: Step 4: Download or Share Your Look
steps.description: Like what you see? Save your new style to your phone or share it with friends on Instagram, TikTok, or anywhere. You'll get one downloadable image per style, no watermark, no fuss.

image.alt: How to use pompadour haircut filter - step by step guide

ctaSections.title: Before a Real Haircut
ctaSections.description: Thinking about switching to a pompadour but feeling unsure? With Hairstyle AI, you can preview the look on your real face before stepping into the barbershop. Try different versions—high pompadour, low fade, or a short textured top—and see which one suits your face shape and hair type. It's a smart way to avoid regrets and awkward growing-out phases.

image.alt: pompadour haircut preview - try before cutting real hair

ctaSections.title: Share Your New Look with Friends
ctaSections.description: Want to surprise your friends or just have fun online? Use Hairstyle AI to try out bold pompadour styles and share your look on social media. Whether it's a slick modern fade or a retro Elvis vibe, the results are super realistic and perfect for laughs or compliments. Post your transformation on TikTok, Instagram, or send it in a group chat.

image.alt: Social media content - fun pompadour transformation for posts

ctaSections.title: Exploring Style Changes for Hair Loss
ctaSections.description: Worried about thinning hair or a receding hairline? Hairstyle AI is here to help. Try pompadour styles that create volume and visually fill in sparse areas. A low fade or messy pompadour can add shape and draw attention upward. You'll see exactly how different versions affect your overall appearance—before making any real changes.

image.alt: Pompadour haircut for men with thinning hair

faqConfig.question: What is a Pompadour hairstyle?
faqConfig.answer: A Pompadour is a classic hairstyle characterized by volume at the front, with the hair swept upward and backward. It can be styled in many variations, from sleek and modern to voluminous and bold.

faqConfig.question: Is the Pompadour suitable for all face shapes and hair types?
faqConfig.answer: Yes, the Pompadour is versatile. It works well with most face shapes, such as oval, square, and heart-shaped faces. It can be adapted for different hair textures, including curly, straight, and wavy hair.

faqConfig.question: What if I have thinning hair?
faqConfig.answer: The Pompadour style works great for thinning hair as it adds volume and texture. The AI adjusts the hairstyle to ensure it looks natural and full, boosting your confidence.

faqConfig.question: What are the benefits of a Pompadour?
faqConfig.answer: The Pompadour adds volume, height, and a bold look. It's a timeless style that can make your face appear more structured and give a sharp, clean-cut appearance. Perfect for professional or casual settings!

faqConfig.question: How much maintenance does a Pompadour require?
faqConfig.answer: The Pompadour requires moderate maintenance to keep it looking sharp and stylish. You'll need to use a high-quality styling product, such as pomade or gel, to maintain the sleek, voluminous look. Regularly blow-drying your hair helps achieve the desired height and structure. Additionally, it's important to trim the sides and back every few weeks to preserve the clean, tapered shape.

faqConfig.question: Will the virtual try-on change my face shape?
faqConfig.answer: No, the virtual try-on tool does not alter your face shape. It simply shows how the hairstyle looks on your natural face, allowing you to explore different styles before committing to a haircut.

faqConfig.question: Is using the AI tool safe?
faqConfig.answer: Absolutely! Our AI tool is designed with privacy in mind. We don't store your images, and all generated hairstyles are deleted after you download them.

faqConfig.question: Is the Pompadour suitable for me?
faqConfig.answer: The Pompadour can suit most people! To find out if it works for your face shape and hair type, simply upload a photo to try it on virtually. The tool will show how it fits your features.
